#Text=CanadaVOTES : Animal Alliance ( AAEVPC ) candidate Marie Crawford running in Toronto — Danforth
#Text=Thursday , October 2 , 2008
#Text=On October 14 , 2008 , Canadians will be heading to the polls for the federal election .
#Text=Animal Alliance Environment Voters Party of Canada candidate Marie Crawford is standing for election in the riding of Toronto — Centre .
#Text=Marie is a Director of Animal Alliance of Canada , a separate but related organization .
#Text=She volunteers her time for Animal Alliance , but unlike party leader Liz White , does not work out of their office .
#Text=Wikinews contacted Marie , to talk about the issues facing Canadians , and what they and their party would do to address them .
#Text=Wikinews is in the process of contacting every candidate , in every riding across the country , no matter their political stripe .
#Text=All interviews are conducted over e-mail , and interviews are published unedited , allowing candidates to impart their full message to our readers , uninterrupted .
#Text=The incumbent in this riding is National Democratic Party ( NDP ) leader Jack Layton .

#Text=Other than Crawford , trying for the riding are Liberal Andrew Lang , Sharon Howarth ( Green ) , and Christina Perreault ( Conservative ) , Marcell Rodden ( Marxist-Leninist ) , and Bahman Yazdanfar ( Canadian Action Party ) , and independent John Richardson .

#Text=The riding has existed federally since 1979 , and has the seat has been occupied by Bob Rae ( NDP , 1979 – 1982 ) , Lynn McDonald ( NDP , 1982 – 1988 ) , Dennis Mills ( Liberal , 1988 – 2004 ) , and Layton ( NDP , 2004 to present ) .
#Text=For more information , visit the campaign 's official website , listed below .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Why are you running for political office , why at the federal level , why this party , and why in this riding ?
#Text=I am running for political office because I am confident that I can represent the positive ideals that many people in this riding share .
#Text=I have lived in Toronto-Danforth for 16 years , and have owned and operated a restaurant in the area for 9 years .

#Text=There are many people here that appreciate and respect other animals and and to see more done to reduce humans ' impact on the environemt and have a safe , respectful future for their children .
#Text=Things like banning plastic bags and eliminating takeout cups and packaging would be welcome ways to help people reduce their impact on the environment .

#Text=Running at a Federal Level cannot address all of those issues mentioned above , but other issues can , like amending the Criminal Code to increase penalties for animal abusers , ending the Canadian seal hunt and shedding light on the fact that animal factory farming practices are the number one contributing factor to climate change - a fact that is repeatedly swept under the rug .
#Text=I have been a part of Animal Alliance - the founder of the AAEVPC - for 15 years .

#Text=The manner in which we have been trying to change laws to protect animals ( years and years of lobbying and empty promises from politicians ) has not been effective , so I was eager to be a candidate once the party was formed so I could make real change for animals if elected , and certainly raise awareness in the meantime .
#Text=Previous to this campaign , have you been politically involved ?
#Text=How will you apply your previous work/volunteer/life experience to serving your constituents ?
#Text=I have worked on several election campaigns for a couple of noteable politicians , and Aimal Alliance in itself is a legislative organization that I have been a part of for many years .

#Text=I firmly believe that government reps are not " us or them " , but people who should ultimately care about what is best for the people who have elected and put their faith in them to do what is best for all .
#Text=These days , government has become more about greed , and many politicians have compromised their own ethics to simply get votes .
#Text=I believe I am capable of leading by positive example and truly bringing a compassionate and respectful type of representation in this riding .
#Text=As you campaign around your riding , it 's likely that some issues are mentioned more often by voters , than other issues .
#Text=What would you say are the three hottest topics this election , in your riding ?
#Text=What would you and your party do to address these issues ?
#Text=Part of my campaigning is to ultimately embrace positive activities and foster a greater sense of compassion in people .
#Text=By doing so , compassion for other animals and respect for eachother and the environment will surely follow .
#Text=Ultimately , this form of representation has no boundaries .

#Text=In this riding we have many people opposed to the " big " box " stores moving in to the area , of which I would actively attempt to allow only smaller family or entrepreneur-owned businessed to move in to the area .

column1: #Text=But once I continue to speak further with people , and they largely agree that the current Criminal Code is too weak when it comes to animal abusers , and agree that animals used for food must be treated humanely , and their own cat or dog is twirling around their feet and I can remind them that they probably care about other animals just as much as our party does and that we 're just trying to work on their behalf , well , they become interested listeners and agree that animals are largely forgotten on a government level
#Text=There are more ways than ever to get your message out , from the traditional campaign fliers and lawn signs , to new media like websites , Facebook , and YouTube .
#Text=The tried-and-true routes get the message out to the masses much easier , but digital alternatives are much more measurable in how many are seeing or interacting with your campaign .
#Text=What seems to be the most effective , from your experience ?
#Text=With such little time to really get media and material going in this election , I ca n't say for sure at this time .
#Text=Perhaps we will see what 's been most effective after the election !
